extendedInfo.description: Real-time flight tracking from industry leaders. Track flights live & save to My Trips. View Arrivals & Departures Boards for US & Canada's largest airports. See gates, delays & cancellations. Instant flight status change alerts. Send trip itinerary or flight status to others or calendar. View airport delay map + weather.  Optimized for both phones and now tablets!

reviews.title: ok
reviews.comment: Unresponsive developer, not taking small but badly needed improvements seriously. I still think it is worth the money. Would be 5 stars otherwise
reviews.author: Bennet Drover

reviews.title: Not what it claims to be.
reviews.comment: This is not real time. I\'m an hour late sitting on the ramp with no updates. From the time I got up in the morning it told me the flight was in the B concourse however, my boarding pass from the day before said C23 it never changed and that is the gate I left out of. The app had 18 hours to get it right and never did. I wouldn\'t waste your money on it, I wish I hadn\'t.
reviews.author: Allen Hornback

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: One of my favorite and most-used apps.  Just wish it would allow me to default to an airline so I don\'t have to type in the same one all of the time.  I always fly Southwest.
reviews.author: Gerald Hines

reviews.comment: Gets the Job Done
reviews.author: Ernie Stephens

reviews.title: Save aircraft
reviews.comment: This app is great, but it is lacking the feature to save flight numbers. FlightAware has this, but I don\'t like its interface. I work at an airport and it would be convenient to have a list of our flights every day. If the list showed information like out/off and on/in times that would be even better.
reviews.author: Anthony Gaines

reviews.title: Flight view cannot find flights
reviews.comment: Hello,    I have a flight in less than 1 month and Flight view cannot find the flight so that I can track it. Why is this so? Very disappointing
reviews.author: David Mazgaj

reviews.title: Works for me!
reviews.comment: I would like it though if I  could sync.  Tablet with smartphone or with Google. Other than that.... Perfect!
reviews.author: Fred Clements

reviews.title: Getting worse
reviews.comment: Now it insist I upgrade to latest version only to see that there is no newer version. Have to install different app because more than one flight confuses this app and is unusable. I WISH a different version was available. Trying to stay loyal but it just ain\'t working.
reviews.author: Cyber Zilla

reviews.title: Non-responsive developer.
reviews.comment: App needs swapping of departure and arrival cities for easy reverse route lookup. Developer does not respond to requests, therefore 1* as an attention getter. Stupid app says there is an update even though there is none.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ultimate traveler app, and likely great for chauffeurs too...
reviews.comment: I FLY A LOT!
reviews.author: Jonathan DeLong

reviews.title: Update?
reviews.comment: Can you make it so that when you touch flight number box to enter data it defaults to the number pad screen instead of text qwerty screen? Thanks Martin
reviews.author: Martin Taylor

reviews.title: No longer works on 7\" tablets?
reviews.comment: After an upgrade, interface is unusable on Samsung Galaxy Tab (last working was before 2.5.3, and I stupidly let my older backups vanish)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Its ok
reviews.comment: This app would be great if it had Recently Searched buttons.  It\'s a pain to continually enter the airline and flight number each time you want to check the status.
reviews.author: K Dunn

reviews.title: Inaccurate data sources
reviews.comment: On BA 205 LHR-MIA today, the flight departed 18:06 but FlightView claimed departure 18:26. Projected arrival by airline (and airport, and other flight-tracking apps & web sites) is now 22:46 but FlightView says 20:40. The \"upstream\" data source for FlightView is unreliable and inaccurate. Map doesn\'t work on this flight, showing only a partially-drawn white line from around PA heading westward off the left edge of the screen.  Earlier flights connecting into London show first (DY 161 TRD-BGO) as cancelled and the second (DY 1314 BGO-LGW) as \"no recent info\" (but if you click for details on that flight it also says \"cancelled\"). In fact both flights departed and arrived successfully, but also early. Again, other flight-tracking apps and web sites got this information correctly.  Other apps provide more reliable, accurate information. Disappointing performance from a company promoting itself as \"the leaders in real-time flight information\".
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not connected
reviews.comment: Unless I just haven\'t figured out how to use this app fully, I don\'t like that my devices aren\'t all linked to one account. I would like to enter on one device, but get updates or make changes on any device. Other than that I have had good luck with getting accurate updates.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Like it
reviews.comment: Great uodates i was not hearing while on tarmac on a recently diverted flight.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The best app for checking flight
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: OK, but several issues...
reviews.comment: 1/ notifications only generated if time to flight is <6 hours (confirmed by developer). 2/ widget does not synch properly with main app. Flight changes which show in full app are not shown in widget, even a day later. 3/ landscape only? Please... 4/ no zoom able maps. Problems (1) & (2) are critical fails.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Used to be great in previous versions
reviews.comment: But sometimes the completed flight status never gets updated. And reminders sometimes are outdated or missing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Would be wonderful if it could be expanded to all airports worldwide...
reviews.author: A Google User
